fn.p: Funding. This work was supported by the project ELIXIR-GR: Hellenic Research Infrastructure for the Management and Analysis of Data from the Biological Sciences (MIS 5002780) which is implemented under the Action Reinforcement of the Research and Innovation Infrastructure, funded by the Operational Program Competitiveness, Entrepreneurship and Innovation (NSRF 2014-2020) and co-financed by Greece and the European Union (European Regional Development Fund). We acknowledge support from the German Research foundation (DFG) and the Open Access Publication Funds of GÃ¶ttingen University.
